full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 743 Filed 08/10/22 Page 26 of 247 154 LBUVMAX2 Visoski - direct 1 A. Little St. James. 2 Q. About how often did you visit Little St. James during your employment for Mr. Epstein? 3 4 A. Every time we went to the St. Thomas U.S. Virgin Islands, 5 where the island was located. 6 Q. About how often did you fly Mr. Epstein to the U.S. Virgin Islands? 7 8 A. Had been every week, every ten days, if we weren't elsewhere in the world, but it was a regular destination. 9 10 Q. And why did you go to the island each time Mr. Epstein went to the Virgin Islands? 11 12 A. I also flew the helicopter. So when Mr. Epstein would arrive at St. Thomas main airport, I would go get the 13 helicopter and then pick him up and the passengers and fly them 14 to Little St. James Island, as well as, you know, taking 15 luggage and also picking up luggage at the island. And also a 16 very large home theater was installed at that residence as 17 well. 18 19 Q. Did you install large home theaters in all of Mr. Epstein's 20 residences? 21 A. Yes, I did. 22 Q. Other than helicopter, how else could you get to Little St. 23 James? 24 A. The other option would be boat. 25 MS. COMEY: Ms. Drescher, can we please pull up  SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00017388
